title: Temperature PID Control
description: A Apollo Runtime based python PID controller, to control the temperature

Kp.description: The value for the proportional gain

Ki.description: The value for the integral gain

Kd.description: The value for the derivative gain

setpoint.description: The initial set point that the PID will try to achieve

sample_time.description: The time in seconds which the controller should wait before generating a new output value. The PID works best when it is constantly called (eg. during a loop), but with a sample time set so that the time

auto_mode.description: Whether the controller should be enabled (auto mode) or not (manual mode)

input_data_point.description: The data point that provides the input value for PID control loop

output_data_point.description: The data point that will be changed by PID control loop
